#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int n,i,x,d=0;
    while(1)
    {
        int sum=0,c=0;
        d++;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n==0)break;
        int a[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {scanf("%d",&a[i]);sum+=a[i];}
        x=sum/n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]>x)c+=a[i]-x;
        }
        printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n\n",d,c);
    }
    return 0;
}
